description: Protocol for Northern Blot using radioactive RNA probes.
before_start: Generate a PCR product with a T7 promoter for generating riboprobes. Make sure the riboprobe is antisense to the RNA of interest.
warning:
Always wear a lab coat, goggles and gloves when working with radioactive materials.

Limit exposure to radioactive materials. 

Measure all materials with a Geiger counter.
protocol_affiliation: Institute of Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf

sub_authors.affiliation: Institute of Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf
Institute for Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich-Heine University Düsseldorf

authors_list.name: Anna Behle
authors_list.affiliation: Institute of Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf

source_data.description: Separate RNA by PAGE:
Protocol for separating total RNA under denaturing conditions using Urea-PAGE using the 10 mL Hoefer SE260 Mighty Small system.
source_data.before_start:
Thoroughly clean all components with ethanol and RNase away.

Heat block to 95˚C.
source_data.warning:
Wear vinyl gloves when handling PAA.

Make sure to thoroughly wash wells before loading samples.

2x RNA loading buffer contains formamide.
source_data.protocol_affiliation: Institute of Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf

authors_list.name: Anna Behle
authors_list.affiliation: Institute of Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich Heine University Düsseldorf

components.data: Dissolve 5 g urea in PAA, 10x TBE and H2O. This can be done at RT or at 40˚C. Agitate/shake occasionally.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve 5 g urea in PAA, 10x TBE and H2O. This can be done at RT or at 40˚C. Agitate/shake occasionally.

source_data.body: Wear vinyl gloves when handling PAA (neurotoxic!)

components.data:
Let the liquid cool down before pouring gel.

Assemble gel caster. Take a 1 mL aliquot of gel mixture, add 20 µL APS and 1 µL TEMED and quickly pour to prevent gel from running out.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Let the liquid cool down before pouring gel.

Assemble gel caster. Take a 1 mL aliquot of gel mixture, add 20 µL APS and 1 µL TEMED and quickly pour to prevent gel from running out.

components.data:
Add 80 µL APS and 12 µL TEMED to the rest of the gel and quickly pour. Insert comb immediately and clasp tight to prevent leakage. Let polymerize for an hour or over night.

Gels can be stored for a week by wrapping with wet paper towels and Saran wrap.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 80 µL APS and 12 µL TEMED to the rest of the gel and quickly pour. Insert comb immediately and clasp tight to prevent leakage. Let polymerize for an hour or over night.

Gels can be stored for a week by wrapping with wet paper towels and Saran wrap.

components.data:
For Northern Blot Analysis, at least 2-3 µg of RNA should be loaded per well.

Adjust concentration and volume of all RNA samples by adding RNase-free ddH2O. Add desired amount of 2x or 5x RNA loading dye.

Denature RNA at 95˚C for 5 min. Snap cool on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
For Northern Blot Analysis, at least 2-3 µg of RNA should be loaded per well.

Adjust concentration and volume of all RNA samples by adding RNase-free ddH2O. Add desired amount of 2x or 5x RNA loading dye.

Denature RNA at 95˚C for 5 min. Snap cool on ice.

source_data.body: RNA loading dye contains formamide. Wear goggles/lab coat/ gloves!

components.data: Add running buffer (1x TBE). Remove comb. Before loading samples, wash all wells and each well individually just before loading with 1xTBE and a syringe or a pipette tip. Carefully pipet samples into wells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add running buffer (1x TBE). Remove comb. Before loading samples, wash all wells and each well individually just before loading with 1xTBE and a syringe or a pipette tip. Carefully pipet samples into wells.

components.data:
Close the lid and plug electrodes into power supply.

Separate RNA at 20 mA/gel, ~1 hour.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Close the lid and plug electrodes into power supply.

Separate RNA at 20 mA/gel, ~1 hour.

components.data:
Pour out buffer, then disassemble gel.

Incubate gel in 0.5x TBE + GelRed for 10 minutes, then visualize.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Pour out buffer, then disassemble gel.

Incubate gel in 0.5x TBE + GelRed for 10 minutes, then visualize.

components.data:
Measure the size of the gel.

Cut a piece of nylon membrane, as well as 4-6 Whatman papers to the corresponding size.

Incubate in 0.5xTBE.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Measure the size of the gel.

Cut a piece of nylon membrane, as well as 4-6 Whatman papers to the corresponding size.

Incubate in 0.5xTBE.

components.data:
On the BioRad TransBlot semi-dry blotting system, assemble blotting sandwhich:

(-)Cathode

3 layers of Whatman paper

Nylon membrane

Gel

3 layers of Whatman paper

(+)Anode

 

Make sure to remove any air bubbles.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
On the BioRad TransBlot semi-dry blotting system, assemble blotting sandwhich:

(-)Cathode

3 layers of Whatman paper

Nylon membrane

Gel

3 layers of Whatman paper

(+)Anode

 

Make sure to remove any air bubbles.
Blot at 2 mA/cm2 for 45 minutes.

components.data: Crosslink transferred RNA with the membrane using UV-light. This can be done while documenting transfer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Crosslink transferred RNA with the membrane using UV-light. This can be done while documenting transfer.

components.data:
While the probe is transcribed:

Prehybridize membrane at 42 ˚C for 1 hour in hybridization buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
While the probe is transcribed:

Prehybridize membrane at 42 ˚C for 1 hour in hybridization buffer.

components.data:
• Blotting Buffer: 0.5x TBE (50 mM Tris-HCl, 50 mM boric acid, 1 mM EDTA
  • 5x Ribomax buffer: 400 mM Hepes-KOH pH 7.5, 60 mM MgCl2, 10 mM spermidine, 200 mM DTT
  • 20x Roti-Stock SSC buffer (Roth): 3 M NaCl, 300 mM sodium citrate, pH=7.0
  • Hybridization buffer: 50% (v/v) formamide, deionized, 7 % (w/v) SDS, 120 mM Na-Phosphate buffer, pH=7.2 (Na2HPO4, NaH2PO4, 250 mM NaCl)
  • Washing buffer I: 2x SSC, 1 % (w/v) SDS
  • Washing buffer II: 1x SSC, 0.5 % (w/v) SDS
  • Washing buffer III: 0.5x SSC, 0.1 % (w/v) SDS
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
• Blotting Buffer: 0.5x TBE (50 mM Tris-HCl, 50 mM boric acid, 1 mM EDTA
  • 5x Ribomax buffer: 400 mM Hepes-KOH pH 7.5, 60 mM MgCl2, 10 mM spermidine, 200 mM DTT
  • 20x Roti-Stock SSC buffer (Roth): 3 M NaCl, 300 mM sodium citrate, pH=7.0
  • Hybridization buffer: 50% (v/v) formamide, deionized, 7 % (w/v) SDS, 120 mM Na-Phosphate buffer, pH=7.2 (Na2HPO4, NaH2PO4, 250 mM NaCl)
  • Washing buffer I: 2x SSC, 1 % (w/v) SDS
  • Washing buffer II: 1x SSC, 0.5 % (w/v) SDS
  • Washing buffer III: 0.5x SSC, 0.1 % (w/v) SDS
Protocol for radioactive labelling of RNA using T7-Polymerase and α-[32P]-UTP.
source_data.protocol_affiliation: Institute for Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich-Heine University Düsseldorf

authors_list.name: Anna Behle
authors_list.affiliation: Institute for Synthetic Microbiology, Heinrich-Heine University Düsseldorf

components.data: • 5x Ribomax buffer: 400 mM Hepes-KOH, pH 7.5; 60 mM MgCl2; 10 mM spermidine; 200 mM DTT
components.name: Description

source_data.description: • 5x Ribomax buffer: 400 mM Hepes-KOH, pH 7.5; 60 mM MgCl2; 10 mM spermidine; 200 mM DTT

components.data:
PCR Product containing the T7-Promoter (100 ng - 1 µg)

Ribomax buffer          6 µL

Pyrophosphatase      1 µL

RNase inhibitor       0.5 µL

DTT (1 M)                 2 µL

ATP 10 mM            1.8 µL

CTP 10 mM            1.8 µL

GTP 10 mM            1.8 µL

 

α-[32P]-UTP               3 µL

T7 RNA-Polymerase        1 µL      

H2O ad                       30 µL

 

 

Incubate reaction for at least 2 hours at 37˚C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
PCR Product containing the T7-Promoter (100 ng - 1 µg)

Ribomax buffer          6 µL

Pyrophosphatase      1 µL

RNase inhibitor       0.5 µL

DTT (1 M)                 2 µL

ATP 10 mM            1.8 µL

CTP 10 mM            1.8 µL

GTP 10 mM            1.8 µL

 

α-[32P]-UTP               3 µL

T7 RNA-Polymerase        1 µL      

H2O ad                       30 µL

 

 

Incubate reaction for at least 2 hours at 37˚C.

components.data: Remove excessive radioactive nucleotides by cleaning the probe using a G-50 column (GE-Healthcare).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove excessive radioactive nucleotides by cleaning the probe using a G-50 column (GE-Healthcare).

components.data: Generate a PCR product using primers containing the T7-promoter. Gel-extract or clean up using column purification.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Generate a PCR product using primers containing the T7-promoter. Gel-extract or clean up using column purification.

components.data:
Add radioactive probe directly to the hybridization buffer. Make sure not to pipet onto membrane.

Hybridize for 6 hours or over night. Use calculated annealing temperature or 62˚C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add radioactive probe directly to the hybridization buffer. Make sure not to pipet onto membrane.

Hybridize for 6 hours or over night. Use calculated annealing temperature or 62˚C.

components.data:
Wash membrane:

  • 10 min in Washing buffer I (42 °C)
  • 5 min in Washing buffer II (42 °C)
  • A few seconds in Washing buffer III (RT)
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Wash membrane:

  • 10 min in Washing buffer I (42 °C)
  • 5 min in Washing buffer II (42 °C)
  • A few seconds in Washing buffer III (RT)

components.data:
Wrap membrane in transparent plastic foil to prevent leakage of radioactive material.

Place a phosphor plate/screen on top. 

Incubate depending on signal strength.

5S rRNA: 30 minutes

Other RNA: An hour to over night
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Wrap membrane in transparent plastic foil to prevent leakage of radioactive material.

Place a phosphor plate/screen on top. 

Incubate depending on signal strength.

5S rRNA: 30 minutes

Other RNA: An hour to over night
Detect signals using a phosphoimager (Fujifilm).

components.data: Prepare phosphor screen by illuminating for at least 30 minutes. This erases previously obtained signals.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare phosphor screen by illuminating for at least 30 minutes. This erases previously obtained signals.
